title: Igor Tudor is no longer Juventus' head coach - Juventus
snippet: Juventus Football Club announces that it has today relieved Igor Tudor of his duties as head coach of the Men's First Team, along with his staff consisting of Ivan Javorcic, Tomislav Rogic and Riccardo Ragnacci.

title: Juventus announce Igor Tudor sacking and interim replacement as Bianconeri aim to repeat 56-year trick - Sports Mole
snippet: The club also announced that 52-year-old Massimo Brambilla - the current head coach of Juve's Next Gen team - has been appointed caretaker manager and will be in the dugout for Wednesday night's Serie A clash with Udinese.

title: Comolli confirms Tudor will be Juventus’ manager for the 2025-26 season | Black & White & Read All Over
snippet: The biggest one, though, was for the immediate future and what Igor Tudor’s status for the 2025-26 season was going to be. We didn’t have to wait long to get an answer. Comolli was quick to confirm Tudor — who took over for Thiago Motta ...

title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.

title: Juventus FC - Current and former staff | Transfermarkt
